com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.management

Class DEDManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.management.DEDManager

  • public class DEDManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The core Dragon Boss Battle manager. Boss battle manipulation and loot generation mechanics are managed in this class
